TopicTitle: How can I play the stock career mode while using a system where Kerbin is scaled to the size of earth and the stock engines are also scaled up

Articles.Content:
I really like the stock career mode in ksp. But what I do not like is how Kerbin is not accurately sized to earth (which I understand is a part of the game). How can I keep playing stock career mode while playing in a scaled up Kerbin that is the same size as earth. I want to continue using the stock engines so I figure I am going to have to scale those up as well. I’m also assuming that applies to fuel tanks. Any mod and suggestions to make this possible. 

If that paragraph didn’t make sense here is a list of what I want:

1. Stock career mode

2. Kerbin resized to the size of earth

3. Be able to use stock parts (engines, fuel tanks, etc)

@PatelPratham

3 hours ago, Mythical Donuts said:

Sigma Dimensions plus 10x Rescale plus SMURFF

If you want actual size stock parts as well, you can add Transmogrifier, this lets you make realistically proportioned rockets without messing around with realFuels/RO which has a very steep learning curve.
